info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: XSS-Protection header in Explorer, Chrome, and Safari contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability if set to any value other than `0`.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.sca-rga.interieur.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' ; connect-src http: https: ws: ; font-src 'self' http: https: ws: data: ; img-src 'self' http: https: ws: data: ; media-src 'self' https: http: ws:; script-src 'self' http: https: ws:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' http: https: ws:; Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 25 Sep 2022 01:39:17 GMT Etag: "457-5d99e2b1e00c0-gzip" Expect-Ct: max-age=86400, enforce Last-Modified: Mon, 07 Mar 2022 10:17:15 GMT Set-Cookie: YOMe1h3tgHKNQxhV6V7n5g__=v1cXPKgwSD3ub; Expires=Sun, 25-Sep-2022 03:39:16 GMT; Path=/ Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: sameorigin X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Accueil | Référentiel Général des Armes

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: www.sca-rga.interieur.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden Connection: close Content-Length: 199 Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 Date: Sun, 25 Sep 2022 01:43:53 GMT 403 Forbidden

Forbidden

You don't have permission to access this resource.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: www.sca-rga.interieur.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://www.sca-rga.interieur.gouv.fr/'
